article.headline: Montana State 79, Idaho 69
article.story: BOZEMAN, Mont. (AP) -- Al Beye scored 22 points and grabbed nine rebounds Saturday night to lead Montana State to a 79-69 victory over Idaho in a matchup set up by the teams' involvement in the ESPN BracketBusters pool. Marvin Moss scored 13 of his 20 points in the second half, including the Bobcats' first eight points after the break, to give MSU (14-12) a 48-39 lead with 15:53 left. Beye had six dunks, including one after he blocked an Idaho jump shot. Derrick Edmonds tracked down the ball, threw it to Nick Dissly who hit Beye for a crowd-pleasing dunk that put the Bobcats up 55-44 with 12:26 remaining. A 15-foot jumper by Ja'Ron Jefferson gave the Bobcats a 65-50 lead with 6:25 remaining, but Idaho (4-19) scored eight straight to cut the margin to 65-58 on a pair of free throws by David Dubois at the 3:56 mark. Beye scored six unanswered points to give MSU a 71-58 lead with just under two minutes to play. His dunk with 1:01 left gave the Bobcats a 74-60 lead. Beye has now scored at least 20 points in four of the past five games. Tanoris Shepard led Idaho with 21 points while Nebojsa Jakovijevic and Keoni Watson each scored 11. Edmonds had 16 points for Montana State, which led 40-39 at halftime. Idaho is now 0-11 in road games this season.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
